Entry.JapaneseText: 操舵輪の前で○ボタンを押せば 船内の好きな階層やワールドマップへ行ける メニューが表示されるの
Entry.EnglishText: If you press the ○ button in front of the ship's wheel, a menu will appear that lets you go to any floor on the ship or head out to the World Map.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、今は準備中だから少し待っててね。 ちなみにSTARTボタンを押しても 同じメニューに移るけど、こっちも準備中よ
Entry.EnglishText: But it's still getting ready right nowso please wait just a little longer. You can also press the START buttonto open the same menu... but that oneis still under preparation too.
